About me

Frontend Developer

I want to use my technical programming skills to effectively contribute to the development of projects within your company.
I am focused on learning and developing my skills as much as possible in this regard.

Technologiestools

Implemented various projects on the frontend, developing complete user interfaces, using special web applications to implement the design of the sites, such as Figma, Adobe XD.

Implemented the dynamic functionalities in the developed sites through React library and the Vanilla JavaScript, using various tools such as BitBucket and Monday throughout this sites development process.

Vanilla JavaScript implemented at a very efficient level in many projects, followed by intermediate level development with the React library in the last projects.

HTML at an advanced level, implemented in projects natively, in React projects through JSX syntax, as well as in Astro projects. For user interfaces I used Figma, Adobe XD.

Vanilla CSS, the SASS preprocessor, the Tailwind CSS framework, all at the same advanced level of implementation in the developed projects.

The main tools used:

  • Adobe XD
  • Figma
  • Monday
  • BitBucket
  • Clockify
  • GIT
  • Postman
  • NPM

My Projects

Portfolio

In this portfolio website I have synthesized my entire personal experience as a frontend developer apart from the projects developed on the job so far.

In the development of the project, the tech stack used was:

  • HTML
  • SASS
  • JavaScript

Fitness App

This website is based on making a personalized fitness subscription, following a complex fully configurable form, the user must be logged into the account, to be able to sign up and access the subscription information.

In the development of the project, the tech stack used was:

  • HTML
  • Tailwind CSS
  • JavaScript
